Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Permits the town of Monroe to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Permits the town of Monroe to impose a hotel and motel tax; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of a hotel and motel tax in the town of Monroe; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
